meanings.definition: A student who does not live at a boarding school.
meanings.sent1: The oppidans at the school come from nearby towns.
meanings.sent2: The oppidans commute to school every day.
meanings.sent3: The oppidans organized a study group at the local library.
meanings.sent4: In the land of boarders, the oppidans were the explorers of the town.
meanings.sent5: The oppidans stood out with their daily journeys to school.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a student who does not live at a boarding school.
meanings.sent1: The oppidans' perspective differed from that of the boarders.
meanings.sent2: The school had separate activities for boarders and oppidans.
meanings.sent3: The oppidans' independence was admired by their peers.
meanings.sent4: Her oppidan status allowed her to experience both school and home life.
meanings.sent5: The oppidan students brought a unique energy to the school community.
